function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited sample sizes for household income data analysis","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable insights into income distribution and its relation to electricity usage","Mitigation":"Increase the sample size or perform additional studies to verify trends","Technologies":"Statistical analysis, data modeling","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Potential outliers in household income data","Impact":"Distorted analysis results, leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement outlier detection and removal techniques to ensure data integrity","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, data management teams"},{"Description":"Incomplete data in housing unit records","Impact":"Misrepresentation of household income and electricity usage patterns","Mitigation":"Implement data quality control methods, such as completeness checks and validation procedures","Technologies":"Data management tools, quality control software","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research organizations, data management teams"}]}
